biotools.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate the process of generating protein conformational ensembles from 3D structures using Coarse-Grained tools from the FlexServ server and analysing its molecular flexibility

bioschemas.name: BioExcel Building Blocks tutorials: Macromolecular Coarse-Grained Flexibility
bioschemas.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate the process of generating protein conformational ensembles from 3D structures using Coarse-Grained tools from the FlexServ server and analysing its molecular flexibility
